resources.string: Response times can be affected by your wireless network quality.
See http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html for a list of HTTP response codes.
Sending text messages may cause additional monetary charges. Review your service plan before using this action.

All matching is case-insensitive. Regular expressions must be specified per the Java Pattern specification (and must be duly escaped). See http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/util/regex/Pattern.html for details. Dot consumes newlines (dotall mode).

Header field and all matching is case-insensitive. Regular expressions must be specified per the Java Pattern specification (and must be duly escaped). See http://java.sun.com/javase/6/docs/api/java/util/regex/Pattern.html for details. Dot consumes newlines (dotall mode).
Click a monitor to edit.\n\nLong press a monitor to start, stop or remove.
Click a condition or action to edit.\n\nLong press a condition or action to remove.
